conclusion: Determine magnetic force using magnetic induction intensity and time.
Image shows square wire frame with half in magnetic field.
Calculate magnetic force using F = BIL with L = 0.2 m.
Determine current using resistance and voltage induced by magnetic field.
Evaluate magnetic induction at t = 2.5 s: B = 7 T.
Calculate magnetic force: F = 4 Ω × 7 T = 28 N.
Determine direction of magnetic force: directed to the right.
Calculate frictional force: F_f = F = 28 N.
Direction of frictional force: directed to the left.
Magnitude of frictional force at t = 2.5 s is 28 N, direction is left.
